xwikidoc.title: XWiki Attachment (xwikiattachment)
xwikidoc.content:
This table contains attachment information (not including the content and versions):
|=|=Column Name|=Datatype|=Not null|=auto inc|=flags|=Default Value|=Comments |[[image:DevGuide.DsXWikiAttachment@DevGuide.DatabaseSchema@db_key.gif]]|XWA_ID|BIG_INT(20)|[[image:DevGuide.DsXWikiAttachment@DevGuide.DatabaseSchema@db_check.gif]]|| |0| |[[image:DevGuide.DsXWikiAttachment@DevGuide.DatabaseSchema@db_field.gif]]|XWA_DOC_ID|BIG_INT(20)| || |null| |[[image:DevGuide.DsXWikiAttachment@DevGuide.DatabaseSchema@db_field.gif]]|XWA_FILENAME|VARCHAR(255)|[[image:DevGuide.DsXWikiAttachment@DevGuide.DatabaseSchema@db_check.gif]]|| | | |[[image:DevGuide.DsXWikiAttachment@DevGuide.DatabaseSchema@db_field.gif]]|XWA_SIZE|INTEGER| || |null| |[[image:DevGuide.DsXWikiAttachment@DevGuide.DatabaseSchema@db_field.gif]]|XWA_DATE|DATETIME|[[image:DevGuide.DsXWikiAttachment@DevGuide.DatabaseSchema@db_check.gif]]|| |0000-00-00 00:00:00| |[[image:DevGuide.DsXWikiAttachment@DevGuide.DatabaseSchema@db_field.gif]]|XWA_AUTHOR|VARCHAR(255)| || |null| |[[image:DevGuide.DsXWikiAttachment@DevGuide.DatabaseSchema@db_field.gif]]|XWA_VERSION|VARCHAR(255)|[[image:DevGuide.DsXWikiAttachment@DevGuide.DatabaseSchema@db_check.gif]]| || | |[[image:DevGuide.DsXWikiAttachment@DevGuide.DatabaseSchema@db_field.gif]]|XWA_COMMENT|VARCHAR(255)| | ||null|
